div1.p: I have this day receipted on the several Books, sent me for that purpose, for the dividends due 31 December 1841, 31 March, 30th June and 30th September 1842 on the amount of United States Treasury Loan of 1841 standing in the name of the Secretary of War for the time being, in trust for certain Indian tribes, amounting in all to $5,034.07/100. — On the 16th ultimo I gave an order in favor of D. Saffarrans Esqr. on account of the portion due the Chickasaw orphans for $89. which deducted from the above amount will leave to my credit $4,945. 07/100. This amount you will please place to the credit of the Treasurer.
